articles.author: VOA Learning English
articles.title: Total Lunar Eclipse to Turn Moon Red - VOA Learning English
articles.description: A total lunar eclipse is set to make the moon appear a color between red and orange across the Western Hemisphere. The best views will be Thursday night into Friday morning from places in North America and South America.
articles.content:
A total lunar eclipse is about to make the moon appear a reddish color across the Western Hemisphere.
The event will happen Thursday night into Friday morning. The best places to see the eclipse wil… [+2573 chars]
